about: Suggest a new Flavor for Nixul
title: 'flavor: '
labels: 'flavor'
---

**What's the vibe of your requested Flavor?**
A clear and concise description of the aesthetic and feel of the Flavor you'd like to see. (e.g. "A dark, futuristic cyberpunk theme with neon green accents.")

**Provide links to inspiration or reference material.**
Please provide links to images, color schemes, dotfiles, or other resources that would help us understand the look and feel of your requested Flavor.

**What makes this Flavor unique?**
Tell us what would make this Flavor stand out from the existing ones.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
